column4: I think i may have hosed up Synaptic Package Manager / aptitude... i get this error when in the gui and loading it up --  E: dpkg was interrupted, you must manually run 'dpkg --configure -a' to correct the problem.  E: _cache->open() failed, please report.  After running as prescribe in error message, update-initramfs: failed for /boot/initrd.img-2.6.24.23-generic dpkg: subprocess post-install script returned error exit status
in a terminal run ' sudo dpkg --configure -a '
yep i did that, reread my post
